items.title: test
items.text:
Play any job with a Job Genie cartridge.

Place : Museum.
Requirements : Complete all 4 jobs.

This trophy can be earned when you completed all the jobs within the game. After completing the last one, a lab worker will burst into the museum. This will make 2 mods available, being it ” Low gravity mode” and “Bounce mode”. These mods can be found in the drawer below the 4 jobs. Open the drawer and put one in the cartridge hole. Place a job cartridge on top of it and pull the lever. The trophy will pop when it’s loading the level. See the video below if you are having trouble achieving it.

items.title: Soupception
items.text:
Make soup with soup in it.

Job: Gourmet Chef
Level: Any

You will need to make soup in soup, sounds weird right ?
Phase 1 is to make some soup. Fill a cup with water and poor it in the pot. Now put a cup in the pot with any other ingredient. In the video below the following ingredients are used: Water, Cup, Apple. Now put the heat on and soup will be made. Leave the soup in the pot.

Phase 2 will require you to do the same all over again, please note that you will need to leave the soup from phase 1 in the pot! Should you have any trouble, please see the video below.

items.title: You Monster
items.text:
Shred the JobBot toy in the Office Worker job.

Job: Office Worker
Level: 12 – Shred the evidence

For this trophy you will need to sacrefice a little JobBot toy in a shredder. When the job “office worker” level “Shred the evidence” is done loading, do the following:
Turn around and you will find a little JobBot toy behind the sugar pot. Grab the toy and activate the shredder. Now throw the toy in the Shredder. The video below can be used if you are having trouble.

items.title: Give Yourself A Hand
items.text:
Grab the hidden glove in the Auto Mechanic job

Job: Auto Mechanic
Level: All levels involving a car. (Level 2 for example)

Rotate a car to “Right Front”  and open the dashboard. In the dashboard you will find a glove. Grab it and the trophy will be yours. You can find a video on how to accomplish it below.

items.title: Lucky Winner
items.text:
Scratch off a winning lottery ticket in the Store Clerk job

Job: Store Clerk
Level: Any

For this trophy you will need to scratch a lottery ticket and win the jackpot. The tickets are located left in front of you, in the drawer.
You will need to scratch a few tickets before you will win the jackpot. Scratching can be done with coins, which are located left behind you. If you are having trouble, please see the video below.

items.title: Know Your Maker
items.text:
Read through the credits

Job: Any
Level: Any

Press the action button and a case will appear. This is the same case used to exit a level. Open the case and you will find a little card with “Credits”  written on it. Keep grabbing these cards until the trophy pops. Should you have any trouble achieving this trophy, you can use the video below for assistance.
